about_the_game:
Voidless is a sci-fi space survival sandbox set in the near future within a realistic scale solar system. Resource gathering is a crucial aspect of the game, as players must gather materials to craft better gear and also build their ships and bases. Utilizing either hand tools or more powerful grid based tools you can mine mineral deposits and salvage ships for materials.



Crafting allows players to create new weapons, tools, and other useful items. As players gather more resources, they can progress to building their own bases or outposts on planets, moons, and asteroids, which provide a bit of a safe haven from the dangers of space.



Building bases and ships is done using many different individual blocks that snap together using a node based system. This system allows for a wide range of unique combinations of blocks to truly make your build your own.



Building ships is an essential part of the game, as players can create their own custom spacecraft to explore the solar system, engage in combat, and transport goods. The ships' physics based flight model makes for a realistic and challenging experience, as players must master the controls and adapt to the challenges of space travel.

  • Processor: 4 Core, 3GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Voidless is a sci-fi space survival sandbox set in the near future within a realistic scale solar system. In first or third person, players can explore planets and asteroids, collect resources, and craft items. As well as building bases and ships, all with physics based flight and combat.
